feedback_data: Great product! Really love the new features added this month.
Customer service was terrible... waited 2 hours on hold!!!
The app crashes constantly on my iPhone. Please fix ASAP.
Amazing experience overall. Will definitely recommend to friends.
Price is too high for what you get. Not worth it IMO.

normalized_feedback: Great product! Really love the new features added this month.
Customer service was terrible. Waited 2 hours on hold.
The app crashes constantly on mobile device. Please fix ASAP.
Amazing experience overall. Will definitely recommend to friends.
Price is too high for what you get. Not worth it.
Return Data.processing_summary: Successfully normalized 5 review feedback items. Applied text cleaning, removed excessive punctuation, standardized timestamps to ISO 8601 format, and generated unique identifiers. PII removal was enabled and applied where necessary.
